title: “Where Real Change Actually Begins”
preview: Clip from DTH Episode 299 with Chip Hauss
body:
[Watch Clip](https://wilkwilkinson.substack.com/p/where-real-change-actually-begins)

“I can’t change the government.”

That’s true.

But it’s not the end of the story.

In this short clip from my conversation with Chip Hauss, he names something we don’t talk about enough: where agency actually lives — and how change ripples outward when we start where we are.

This isn’t a platitude. It’s a practice.
